answers.english: Domestic violence is a pattern of abusive behaviors used to gain control and power over a partner.
answers.yoruba: Ifihan ohun ti o nilo lati gbe owo ibi ati agbara si ololufe.
answers.igbo: Ịdị ọnụ ya mere mkpịsị na-abịa nke ya n'ụbọchị na nchekwa na azụta n'eluonye.
answers.hausa: Yadda abin da ya faru ne ke buɗe wa daga cikin dalilan masu dacewa.

answers.english: If you or someone you know is in immediate danger, please call emergency services.
answers.yoruba: Ti o ba ti ojukokoro rẹ tabi eniyan ti o mọ ni igba tuntun, jọwọ pe awọn ọpa ọja.
answers.igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ị bụ nke onye ị sịrị na-agbakwunye, biko kpọọ gwa gwa anya ndị emergency.
answers.hausa: Idan kunya ko wani ya san wani yake, don Allah a yi gwajin ɗan doki.

answers.english: Signs of an abusive relationship may include physical violence, emotional abuse, and controlling behavior.
answers.yoruba: Awọn ifihan ti ibi itẹlọrọ le ṣe ni iye ibi itẹlọrọ, iya ṣirẹkun iṣẹ, ati iṣẹ rere.
answers.igbo: Nchekwa n'ụbọchị na azụta n'eluonye nwere ike ịgba aka, ịkwụ ụlọ, na ịghọtara.
answers.hausa: Dalilai masu cewa za a iya amfani da itace na cutar da murnar, yin ƙyaƙya kai, da abin da ya yi yin tsabar kudi.

answers.english: It's important to create a safety plan and seek help from a local domestic violence organization.
answers.yoruba: Ọpọlọti pese itọnisọna ti o dara julọ ati wa ni ipa lati ilana ti aye ni ki o si tun kọ si iranlọwọ lati ilu ti oṣuwọn itọnisọna.
answers.igbo: Ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ ike ịzụ ọnụ na-agbanwe na na-abịa mkpọrọ aha onwu ndị mba.
answers.hausa: Shin haka ne muna buɗewa sauƙi kuma mu samu hankali daga shugaban cutar da ƙasuwanci.

answers.english: Domestic violence can have long-term effects on children, including behavioral problems and emotional trauma.
answers.yoruba: Ibi itẹlọrọ ti o nilo le ṣe ipa kan ni awọn omo, ni ọjọgbọn ọkan ati iyanu imọran.
answers.igbo: Ịdị ọnụ ya mere gịbu nke ọrụ n'ụzọ, gịbu ego na ịkwụ ihe na-abịa na mmadụ.
answers.hausa: Dabi'uwar wata takwas, za ta iya sauya da kananan wuta a cikin yaran, wanda ya zama sauyi ƙwaƙwalwa da kuma masu zaman kansu.

answers.english: You can find a safe place to stay by reaching out to local shelters or helplines.
answers.yoruba: O le ṣe igba ti o dara julọ lati wa ni ipa pataki ni igbati o ṣe gbe yin si awọn ile-iwe ti ilu tabi awọn laini iṣọkan.
answers.igbo: I nwere ike ịzụ ọnụ n'ala na-abịa ndị ebe anyị na-ejikọrọ ọrụ edemede ma na ha ndị helplines.
answers.hausa: Za ku iya samun wakilai mai tsawo mai yawa don ci gaba da lambobi da kuma helplines.

answers.hausa: Shin yanzu ni da ake gane?

answers.yoruba: Bí ní le ṣe tàbí kí ó bẹ́ẹ̀ sọ́rọ̀ ìbígbòògún tó ti wá nígbà àìtọ́?
answers.igbo: Kedu ka m ga-ewe mmadụ eziokwu?
answers.hausa: Yadda zan iya sauya da ɗan mutum mai kyau?

answers.text: What are some safety tips for using technology to stay safe while living with an abuser?
answers.yoruba: Kíni awọn ìṣe tí a le ṣe sí nípa ìsẹ́tọ́ nítorí wàhálá òṣìṣẹ́ òun òun?
answers.igbo: Gịnịị ndị enweghị ego?
answers.hausa: Shin yadda zan iya aiko da matsala?

answers.text: How can I recognize signs of abuse in elderly populations?
answers.yoruba: Bí ní le ṣe kí ó tán àwọn àgbà bẹ́ẹ̀ nígbà tí a bá wà nígbà àìtọ́?
answers.igbo: Kedu ka m ga-ewele nwata?
answers.hausa: Yadda zan iya sauƙi da mutum?

answers.text: What is the impact of domestic violence on school performance?
answers.yoruba: Kíni ìfẹ́kúrẹ́ nípa ìṣòro àwọn ọmọ ní ìwé ìránṣẹ́?
answers.igbo: Gịnịị ndị adịkarị nwere ike ịgba aka n'adapụ?
answers.hausa: Gaskiya shine yadda cutar ke amfani da cikakken ɗan makarantar.

answers.text: How can I access support for my immigration status?
answers.yoruba: Bí ní le ṣe wọ́n lókè láti ṣe ìyàwó òún nígbà tí a bá wà nígbà àìtọ́?
answers.igbo: Kedu ka m ga-akwado ụzọ?
answers.hausa: Yadda zan iya ɗan ɗakokinmu?

answers.text: What are some safety tips for using financial resources to stay safe after leaving an abusive partner?
answers.yoruba: Kíni awọn ìṣe tí a le ṣe sí nípa ìfòwòṣe nígbà tí a bá wà nígbà àìtọ́?
answers.igbo: Gịnịị ndị enweghị ego?
answers.hausa: Shin yadda zan iya samun dama dama a duniya?
